attributes.additional_details: It will allow students to drive to school, college, or work that they otherwise wouldn’t be able to do. This will therefore give them more opportunities.
attributes.background: Lower the driving age to 16 to allow people to drive to school, college, or work.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Reduce age limit for holding a full driving licence to 16 with restrictions
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/733742
